title: Portfolio Site
description: This website is made using React.JS. The website contains a hero section, my Work History section and a page listing projects i've done so far.

title: Note Taking App
description: This application is made with vanilla HTML, CSS and JavaScript. This application lets you note down tasks with a Title and a Description. The Notes are listed next to or below the input section.

title: Tasks App
description: This is an application made up of a backend powered by Nodejs and Expressjs. The frontend is made with Nextjs Framework. You can store a list of tasks with a Title and Description into a database. All tasks are then displayed from the database and you can mark a task omplete and delete one or more tasks.
